data.title: Severin Films
data.meta_description: Creating, rescuing, and releasing the world's most provocative cinema since 2006. Serving the Physical Media and Collector community by restoring and distributing high and low art cinema from all around the world with a vast catalog of genre films such as Horror, Action, Exploitation and Special Interest.
data.text: Sign up for the Severin Films Mailing List to receive updates on new release announcements, upcoming sales, and other news!
